info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:31AM MDT until July 18 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM MDT FOR EASTERN GLACIER COUNTY... At 231 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Browning, or 33 miles west of Cut Bank, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cut Bank, Browning, South Browning, North Browning, East Glacier Park, East Glacier Park Village and Starr School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
